scripts.start:render:prod: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed && node dist/server.js
scripts.db:fresh: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --config src/database/config/config.cjs --migrations-path src/database/migrations && npx sequelize db:migrate --config src/database/config/config.cjs --migrations-path src/database/migrations
scripts.db:fresh:seed: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --config src/database/config/config.cjs --migrations-path src/database/migrations && npx sequelize db:migrate --config src/database/config/config.cjs --migrations-path src/database/migrations && npx sequelize db:seed:all --config src/database/config/config.cjs --seeders-path src/database/seeders
scripts.db:test:reset: cross-env NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate --env test
scripts.db:test:reset:seed: cross-env NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --env test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:migrate --env test && cross-env NODE_ENV=test sequelize db:seed:all --env test
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
